Insights: I have observed more than 10 Sagaa members stabilized their blood sugar levels and reversed prediabetes by incorporating Ayurvedic supplements like Bitter Melon, Fenugreek, and Gymnema Sylvestre into their daily routine. These supplements are known for their blood sugar-lowering properties and can be a natural way to manage prediabetes alongside lifestyle changes.
Recommended Action: Consult your healthcare provider about adding Ayurvedic supplements to your routine.

Insights: I have observed that many Sagaa members have successfully managed their stress levels by incorporating mindfulness practices such as meditation, deep breathing exercises, and yoga into their daily routines. These practices can help promote relaxation and improve overall well-being.
Recommended Action: Incorporate mindfulness practices into your daily routine.

Insights: I have observed that several Sagaa members have improved their sleep quality by establishing a consistent sleep schedule, avoiding screens before bedtime, and creating a relaxing bedtime routine. These habits can help signal to your body that it's time to wind down and prepare for restful sleep.
Recommended Action: Establish a consistent sleep schedule and create a relaxing bedtime routine.

Insights: I understand that your daughter is preparing for college applications. Sagaa members have found success by starting early, focusing on their strengths, and seeking feedback on their essays. Encourage her to highlight her unique experiences and achievements in her applications.
Recommended Action: Advise your daughter to start early, focus on her strengths, and seek feedback on her essays.
